  • Server-Side Scripting Frameworks

PUG

  • templating engine used for server-side templating
  • example: 
    div
  h1 My heading
  ul
    li Some list item
    li Some other list item
  p This here is a paragraph.
  • result: ```html

My heading

  • Some list item
  • Some other list item

This here is a paragraph.

```

Use in Express.js

  • Instructions
  • Excercise
    • Create a simple web page using instructions above

Features

  • Doctype
  • Attributes
  • Includes
  • Excercise
    • Modify the template of the previous excercise so that the result is valid HTML
  • Template inheritance
  • Interpolation
  • Iteration
  • Excercise
    • List the cats in your Mongo database using Pug
    • Resulted HTML might be something like this ```html
    name age gender weight
    Viski 4 male 4
    Kerttu 4 male 5.5

    ```
